what_you_do: Monique S. Pearson is a mindset coach, international motivational speaker, best-selling author, and travel guru.
who_you_serve: Women leaders across industries, especially those in male-dominated spaces and environments.
social_proof: Her expertise and military background have earned her invitations to speak and make guest appearances on major platforms across the globe.
niche: mindset coaching, leadership, women in business
business_focus: Helping women leaders set aside their self-imposed limitations and confidently lead in predominately male spaces and environments.
service_provided: mindset coaching, motivational speaking, travel guidance
